title: Print, "Beheading of John the Baptist", 1510
medium: Woodcut and black ink on paper
signed: Signed in woodcut and black ink lower left, monogram AD
inscribed: Inscribed in woodcut and black ink upper right: 1510
provenance:
Gift of Leo Wallerstein 
Ex-collection of H.S Theobald (Lugt 1375)
description: the executioner stands at right holding the head of St. John, which Salome, left, waits to receive on a plate. The body of St. John, kneeling, faces left. Monogram of Durer, lower left. Date, 1510, upper right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Beheading of John the Baptist", 1510.
1510. Woodcut and black ink on paper. Gift of Leo Wallerstein. 1950-5-20.
